pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Your Data Protection with ElegantEra ElegantEra HOME ABOUT US Watches Contact Privacy Policy At ElegantEra, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you visit our website or interact with our services. Information We Collect We may collect various types of information from you, including: Personal Information: such as your name, email address, phone number, and shipping address, which you provide when making a purchase or contacting us. Device Information: such as your IP address, browser type, and operating system, collected automatically when you visit our website. Cookies: small text files stored on your device that help us enhance your browsing experience and analyze website traffic. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect for various purposes, including: Processing your orders and providing customer support. Improving our website and services based on your feedback and usage patterns. Sending you promotional offers, newsletters, and updates about our products and services (with your consent, where required). Ensuring the security and integrity of our website and protecting against fraud or unauthorized access. ElegantEra website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline.
